snippet: SCHECHTER--Marvin. The finest friend you could have in your life. Marvin will leave a huge void in all the people he touched. He will always be missed and loved by all who knew him. Sincere condolences to Stephen, Scott and their families. Janie and Larry David 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHECHTER--Marvin. The finest friend you could have in your life. Marvin will leave a huge void in all the people he touched. He will always be missed and loved by all who knew him. Sincere condolences to Stephen, Scott and their families. Janie and Larry David 1/3
